header.name: chaos/preprocessor/control/when.h
header.author: Paul Mensonides
header.overview: The header defines a macro that expands to an expression if a condition is non-zero.

macro.abstract: The macro expands to its second argument if its first argument is non-zero.

usage.param: The condition that determines whether the macro should expand to __VA_ARGS__ or nothing. Valid values range from 0 to .
The resulting expression if cond is non-zero.
The condition that determines whether the macro should expand to x or nothing. Valid values range from 0 to .
The resulting expression if cond is non-zero.

macro.para: If cond expands to 0, this macro expands to nothing. Otherwise, it expands to x or __VA_ARGS__.
This macro performs a Boolean conversion on cond. If this conversion is undesirable, may be used instead.
This macro is lazy. If cond is 0, x (or __VA_ARGS__) is not evaluated.
